title: Looking for members to join a team. Looking for a top laner, adc, and support. Plat +
body:
1. Must have a wide variety of champions.
2. Must have a bit of knowledge with shot calling,
3. Must have a mic and suitable programs to use for voice communication.
4. Must be able to play Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and scrims on Satarday's. (schedule may change if suited for the whole teams availability. )
5. Must be able to contact us if you cannot not play on some days etc.
6. Also need a 55% win ratio with positive kda.


Add Mungindipride to talk about it.
